attributes.action: Allow customers to opt out of recieiving electricity generated by wind power
attributes.additional_details:
It is quite wrong  that electricity consumers should have bills inflated by the ridiculous subsidies paid to wind farm generating companies.

Please allow customers the right to  specify that they do NOT want to be supplied with electricity from wind turbines   and accordingly they will not make a contribution to the exhorbitant costs of constructing  such costly  white elephants.
